description: This instrumentation bridges Log4j log events to OpenTelemetry logs.

configurations.name: otel.instrumentation.log4j-appender.experimental-log-attributes
configurations.description: Enables the capture of experimental log attributes, including thread name and thread ID.

configurations.name: otel.instrumentation.log4j-appender.experimental.capture-code-attributes
configurations.description: Enables the capture of code location attributes, including file path, class name, method name, and line number.

configurations.name: otel.instrumentation.log4j-appender.experimental.capture-map-message-attributes
configurations.description: Enables the capture of attributes from Log4j MapMessage instances.

configurations.name: otel.instrumentation.log4j-appender.experimental.capture-marker-attribute
configurations.description: Enables the capture of the Log4j marker attribute.

configurations.name: otel.instrumentation.log4j-appender.experimental.capture-mdc-attributes
configurations.description: Controls which MDC attributes to capture. Use "*" to capture all MDC attributes or provide a comma-separated list of specific keys.

configurations.name: otel.instrumentation.log4j-appender.experimental.capture-event-name
configurations.description: Enables the capture of the event name from the MDC attribute "event.name" and sets it as the log record's event name.
